Embassy

The embassy is a busy place: Diplomats from all over the world negotiate contracts here, forge treaties and found alliances. In order to get a larger alliance you need to upgrade your embassy.
Every level of your embassy increases your diplomacy points. From level 3 on you are able to found an alliance.
